title: The specification for the SWH system laid down by the Ministry of Non- Conventional Energy Sources can be followed
clause_text: The specification for the SWH system laid down by the Ministry of Non- Conventional Energy Sources can be followed. Flat plate Collector conforming to IS 12933 shall be used in all such solar water heating systems.
section: Special Provisions; for installation of Solar Water Heating (SWH) Systems.
